br.com.indirim.quickphoto.util

Class SystemUiHiderHoneycomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.indirim.quickphoto.util.SystemUiHider
      • br.com.indirim.quickphoto.util.SystemUiHiderBase
        • br.com.indirim.quickphoto.util.SystemUiHiderHoneycomb

  • public class SystemUiHiderHoneycomb
extends SystemUiHiderBase
    An API 11+ implementation of SystemUiHider. Uses APIs available in Honeycomb and later (specifically View#setSystemUiVisibility(int)) to show and hide the system UI.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class br.com.indirim.quickphoto.util.SystemUiHider
